statements: SELECT * FROM vendor_information;
SELECT vendor_name, email, phone_number FROM vendor_information;
SELECT vendor_name, address, city, state, zip_code FROM vendor_information;
SELECT * FROM vendor_information WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person, email FROM vendor_information WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT * FROM vendor_information WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT vendor_name, email, phone_number FROM vendor_information WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, contact_person, email, address, city FROM vendor_information WHERE vendor_id > 100 ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendor_information WHERE state = 'Texas' AND zip_code LIKE '7%' ORDER BY vendor_id ASC;
SELECT vendor_id, vendor_name, contact_person, email, phone_number, city, state, zip_code FROM vendor_information WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY city, vendor_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, phone_number FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 3;
SELECT vendor_name, contact_person FROM vendors WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%';
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC, product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, email, phone_number FROM vendors WHERE vendor_id = 3;
SELECT vendor_name, product_name, price FROM vendors JOIN products ON vendors.vendor_id = products.vendor_id;
SELECT vendor_name, SUM(price * quantity) AS total_sales FROM vendors JOIN products ON vendors.vendor_id = products.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name;
SELECT vendor_name, product_name, price FROM vendors LEFT JOIN products ON vendors.vendor_id = products.vendor_id ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM vendors WHERE vendor_location='New York';
SELECT part_name, part_description, part_price FROM parts ORDER BY part_price DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, part_name, purchase_date FROM vendors INNER JOIN purchases ON vendors.vendor_id = purchases.vendor_id;
SELECT vendor_name, COUNT(part_id) AS total_parts FROM vendors INNER JOIN purchases ON vendors.vendor_id = purchases.vendor_id GROUP BY vendor_name;
SELECT * FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_contact FROM vendors WHERE vendor_location = 'New York';
SELECT part_name, part_price FROM parts WHERE part_price > 50 ORDER BY part_price ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, part_name, purchase_date FROM vendors INNER JOIN purchases ON vendors.vendor_id = purchases.vendor_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_purchases, SUM(purchase_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM purchases;
SELECT * FROM vendor_info;
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM vendor_info ORDER BY vendor_name ASC;
SELECT vendor_name, phone_number FROM vendor_info WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM parts_inventory WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT part_name, quantity, price FROM parts_inventory WHERE quantity >= 10;
SELECT vendor_name, email FROM vendor_info;
SELECT * FROM parts_inventory WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT part_name, quantity, price FROM parts_inventory WHERE vendor_id = 1 AND price < 100;
SELECT material_name, price FROM materials_inventory WHERE quantity >= 50 ORDER BY price ASC, material_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, order_date, status FROM purchase_orders WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_location ASC;
SELECT * FROM parts WHERE part_price > 100.00;
SELECT part_name, part_description FROM parts WHERE part_description LIKE '%small%';
SELECT material_name, material_quantity FROM materials ORDER BY material_quantity DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM vendors;
SELECT vendor_name, vendor_location FROM vendors ORDER BY vendor_name DESC;
SELECT part_name, part_description, part_price FROM parts WHERE part_price > 100;
SELECT material_name, material_quantity FROM materials ORDER BY material_quantity ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT v.vendor_name, p.part_name, m.material_name FROM vendors v JOIN vendors_parts vp ON v.vendor_id = vp.vendor_id JOIN parts p ON vp.part_id = p.part_id JOIN orders o ON p.part_id = o.part_id JOIN materials m ON o.material_id = m.material_id WHERE o.quantity > 10;
